t: Check out this Amazon review of Our first Uncle Brick and it's GREAT
s: Uncle Brick's models are fantastic. This is our first kit, and the Model MOC equals the technical models in every facet. They are cross-compatible, so if you need a part or want to change up the look, check your spare parts bin for a part that might work.
